name: Tidehunter
title: Leviathan
lore: The Tidehunter known as Leviathan was once a major player in the politics of the Sunken Isles.

gush.name: Gush
gush.description: Sprays a wave of water that damages and slows an enemy while reducing their armor.

krakenshell.name: Kraken Shell
krakenshell.description: Thickens Tidehunter's skin, reducing damage and removing debuffs after taking enough damage.

anchorSmash.name: Anchor Smash
anchorSmash.description: Tidehunter swings his anchor, damaging nearby enemies and reducing their attack damage.

ravage.name: Ravage
ravage.description: Slams the ground, sending tentacles that stun and damage all enemies in a huge radius.
